item.title: Motherhood Builds the Civilization of Love
item.description: Motherhood is one of the most profound political and spiritual acts available to us to affect society.

item.title: Abortion Disinformation Wins the Pulitzer
item.description: ProPublica ’s series was a political effort to create connections where little, if any, exist between maternal mortality and pro-life laws.
